text: Network connection problems

Dear Sir or Madam, I've been having trouble connecting to the corporate network since yesterday. I'm getting a 'connection failed' error message. Could you please check what the problem could be? Thank you.

ticket.title: Network connection problem
ticket.description: The employee cannot connect to the company network and receives a 'connection failed' error message. The problem has existed since yesterday.

text: Printer has stopped working
Hello support team, our printer on the 2nd floor suddenly stopped working. It no longer prints documents even though it is turned on. Could you please check this?

ticket.title: Printer Malfunction
ticket.description: The printer on the 2nd floor suddenly stopped working and won't print documents even though it is turned on.

text: Reset Password
Hello, I forgot my password and urgently need access to my account. Could you please help me reset my password?

ticket.title: Reset password
ticket.description: Julia Mayer has forgotten her password and urgently needs access to her account. A password reset is required.

text: Software update required
Dear Sir or Madam, I have noticed that my software version is out of date. Could you please update the software?

ticket.title: Software update required
ticket.description: Max Keller needs a software update because the current version is outdated and he needs certain features that are available in the new version.

text: Can not reach server
Hello, since this morning I can't access the server. I'm getting an error message 'Server unreachable'. Can you please check this?

ticket.title: Server Access Problem
ticket.description: Lisa Wagner has been unable to access the server since this morning and is receiving the error message 'Server unreachable'. The problem has persisted since then.

text: Internet connection interrupted
Dear Sir or Madam, I have been having problems with my internet connection since yesterday. The connection drops at irregular intervals and I cannot establish a stable connection. Please help.

ticket.title: Internet connection interrupted
ticket.description: The Internet connection drops out at irregular intervals, which means that stable connections are not possible. This significantly affects my work.

text: Printer no longer prints colors

ticket.title: Printer no longer prints colors
ticket.description: The printer suddenly no longer prints colors. Both when copying and printing via the computer, only black and white printouts appear, even though the color cartridges are sufficiently filled.

text: Software crash when opening files

Hello Support Team,
Since the last software update, the application (application name) always crashes when I try to open certain files. Please resolve this issue.

ticket.title: Software crash while opening files
ticket.description: Since the last software update, the application (application name) crashes every time I try to open certain files. This prevents me from working.

text: Forgot email account password

Hello,
I have forgotten my password for my email account and can no longer access my emails. Please help me restore my access.

ticket.title: Forgot email account password
ticket.description: I forgot my email account password and can no longer access my email. Please help me restore my access.

text: Problems with software installation
Dear Sir or Madam, I am having difficulties installing the 'ABC' software. Despite several attempts, I keep receiving error messages. Please help.

ticket.title: Problems with software installation
ticket.description: When installing the 'ABC' software, I keep getting error messages despite several attempts. I am unable to install the software correctly.

text: Wi-Fi connection problems

ticket.title: Wi-Fi connection problems
ticket.description: The customer is having difficulty connecting to the WiFi despite restarting the router. The problem has existed since yesterday and is affecting the ability to work.

text: Software error when starting the application

Dear support team,

When starting the application software I get an error message 'Application could not be loaded'. Can you please support?

Best regards,
Anna Schmidt

ticket.title: Application startup error
ticket.description: When starting the application, an error message appears that prevents the application from loading. The customer is able to work, but requires assistance to resolve the issue.

text: Printer no longer prints colors

Dear support team,

My printer suddenly no longer prints colors. Both black and white and color prints are affected. Can you help me?

With kind regards,
Laura Müller

ticket.title: Printer does not print colors
ticket.description: The printer suddenly stops printing colors, both black and white and color prints are affected. Although the customer can continue to work, this limitation is annoying and requires a solution.

text: Server connection problems in our office

Hello,

We have been having difficulties connecting to our server since this morning. Other office locations are not affected. Please provide urgent assistance.

Best regards,
Markus Schulz

ticket.title: Server connection problems in the office
ticket.description: There has been a connection problem with the server in the office since the morning. This is affecting several employees as they cannot access the data they need.

text: Problems with email retrieval on the smartphone

Dear support team,

I am having difficulty accessing my emails on my smartphone. I am neither receiving nor sending emails successfully. Can you help me?

With kind regards,
Julia Becker

ticket.title: Email retrieval on smartphone
ticket.description: The data subject cannot receive or send emails on their smartphone. Although they can work, mobile email access is important and urgently needed for them.

text: Printer has stopped working.
Dear support team, since yesterday I can no longer print documents.

ticket.title: Printer Problems
ticket.description: The printer in Office 301 has stopped printing documents since yesterday. An error message appears on the screen. We urgently need a solution as this is severely affecting our ability to work.

text: Access problems to the company network.
Dear support team, I have not been able to log into the company network since this morning.

ticket.title: Network access problem
ticket.description: Since this morning I can no longer log into the company network. I receive an error message saying that the connection has failed. Please help me as soon as possible as I urgently need to access the company data.

text: Software crashes repeatedly.
Dear Support Team, the software I use every day keeps crashing.

ticket.title: Software Crashes
ticket.description: The application software in the development department has been crashing frequently lately. Although this does not immediately affect the ability to work, it is extremely disruptive. We urgently need a solution to be able to work smoothly.

text: Email sending problems.
Dear support team, my emails are not being sent.

ticket.title: Email sending problems
ticket.description: As of this morning I can no longer send emails. The message says that the outgoing mail server cannot be reached. Since sending emails is essential for our sales activities, we urgently need help.

text: Reset Password.
Dear support team, I forgot my password and need help resetting it.

ticket.title: Reset password
ticket.description: I have forgotten my user account password and need urgent help resetting it. Without access to my account, I cannot access important data. Please help me as soon as possible.

text: Wi-Fi connection problems
Dear Support Team, I'm having trouble connecting to WiFi. Despite several attempts, I keep getting an error message. Can you please help?

ticket.title: Wi-Fi connection problems
ticket.description: The employee is having difficulty connecting to the WiFi. Despite several attempts, she receives an error message and cannot access the network.

text: Printer has stopped working
Dear Support Team, our printer in the office has been on strike since yesterday. It no longer prints documents even though it is switched on properly. Can you please check this?

ticket.title: Printer Problems
ticket.description: The printer in the office has stopped working since yesterday. Even though it is switched on, it does not print any documents. This leads to loss of productivity.

text: Reset Password
Hello support team, I forgot my password and can no longer log into my account. Could you please help me reset my password?

ticket.title: Reset password
ticket.description: The employee has forgotten her password and can no longer log into her account. She urgently needs help resetting her password.

text: Perform software update
Dear Support Team, I keep receiving a notification to perform a software update, but I'm unsure whether I should do it. Could you please help me with this?

ticket.title: Help with software update
ticket.description: The employee keeps receiving a notification to perform a software update, but is unsure how to do it. He needs assistance with this process.

text: Email account blocked
Dear Support Team, my email account seems to be blocked. I cannot send or receive emails. Could you please check this?

ticket.title: Blocked Email Account
ticket.description: The employee cannot send or receive emails because her email account appears to be blocked. She needs urgent assistance to resolve the issue.

text: Error accessing the internal network.
Dear Support Team, I can no longer access the internal network since this morning. Neither the usual servers nor the shared drives are accessible. Could you please check this urgently?

ticket.title: Network access error
ticket.description: The employee has no longer been able to access the internal network since morning. Neither servers nor shared drives are accessible.

text: Printer only prints blank pages.

Dear Support Team,
I tried to print documents, but the printer only prints blank pages. I have already updated the printer driver, but to no avail.

ticket.title: Printing Problems
ticket.description: The print jobs result in blank pages even after updating the printer driver.

text: No sound from the speakers.

Dear Support Team,
I have no sound from my computer's speakers even though everything is connected correctly. I also checked the volume settings but nothing changes.

ticket.title: Sound problems
ticket.description: Despite correct wiring and settings, there is no sound from the speakers.

text: Problems with email access.
Dear support team, I have not been able to send or receive emails since yesterday. An error message appears saying that the mailbox is full, but I have already deleted all old emails.

ticket.title: Email access problem
ticket.description: Despite deleting old emails, the affected person cannot send or receive. A mailbox full message is displayed.

text: Program crashes when opening.

Dear Support Team,
Whenever I try to open the 'ApplicationXY' program, it crashes immediately. I have already tried restarting the computer, but the problem persists.

ticket.title: Program crash
ticket.description: The program 'ApplicationXY' crashes immediately upon opening, even after restarting the computer.

text: Wi-Fi connection problem

Dear support team,
I'm having problems connecting to the WiFi. The connection keeps dropping out. Could you please help me with this?
Thank you.

ticket.title: Wi-Fi connection problem
ticket.description: The user is having difficulty connecting to the Wi-Fi. Connection drops occur periodically, affecting work.

text: Printer does not print colors

Hello support team,
My printer suddenly stopped printing colors. Both copies and printouts only show black and white pages. Could you please help me with this?
Thanks in advance.

ticket.title: Printer does not print colors
ticket.description: The printer only outputs black and white prints, even though color cartridges are present and intact. This significantly affects the quality of the prints.

text: Software update failed

Dear Support Team,
I tried to install the latest software update, but the process failed. Now the application no longer works as expected. Please provide assistance.
Thank you.

ticket.title: Failed software update
ticket.description: After the failed software update, the application no longer works properly. The user can no longer access important functions, which affects work.

text: Email retrieval doesn't work

Dear support team,
I can't check my email. The application gives an error message when I try to log in. Could you please help me?
Thank you!

ticket.title: Problem with email retrieval
ticket.description: The user cannot access his email because login fails. An error message appears that prevents access to the email.

text: Unable to access network drive

Hello support team,
I'm having difficulty accessing the network drive. An error message appears when I try to open files. Could you please help me with this?
Thanks!

ticket.title: Problems with network drive access
ticket.description: Unable to access the network drive. When trying to open files, an error message appears that blocks access.
